history.content:
The Society of Plastics Engineers Golden Gate Section (SPE GGS) has a website that was created by an SJSU student (http://speggs.org/). The student is no longer able to update so we are looking for someone who can take on this project. Approximately every 2-3 months, we will need someone to make updates to the web pages in accordance with specifications. The exact changes will be outlined in a document and communicated during a brief meeting. There will be a 2-week deadline for implementing the changes.

We will be paying $50-150 per change request depending on the amount of work required. We currently have a series of changes that need to be implemented ASAP.

 

Ideal Qualifications:

  •        Punctuality
  •        Good communication skills
  •        Follow through

 

Please send resume and brief description of why you’re a good candidate to yschneider@eag.com by Oct 4 if interested.
history.subject: Website Maintenance Position
